overview: Nothing is safe at the moment but then, nothing is ever ‘safe’ in matters of love.  From the digital world of online dating, to meeting face to face for the first time; is finding true romance a dream or can Sam and Andi find a way to be together?  A journey of love for our times, an encounter full of trepidation where distance is just as vital as those soaring feelings of attraction.  When romance is at stake, yet circumstances prevail… just how close would you get?
title: Close
